#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define vi vector<int>
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define all(x) x.begin(),x.end()
const int mod = 1e9 + 7;

const int maxn = 1e6 + 7;

int dp[1007];

int main() {
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin.tie(0);
	int t; cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		int n; cin >> n;
		memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));
		dp[0] = 1;
		int k; cin >> k;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
			int m; cin >> m;
			if (m <= k) {
				for (int s = k; s >= m; --s) {
					dp[s] |= dp[s - m];
				}
			}
		}
		cout << dp[k] << "\n";
	}


	return 0;
}
